languages.text: {n}Парень жестами указывает на хрустальный купол, затем на вас, делает несколько пассов руками и выпрямляется по стойке смирно, упираясь глазами в носки собственных ботинок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Парень жестами указывает на хрустальный купол, затем на вас, изображает ритуал одаривания и выпрямляется по стойке смирно, упираясь глазами в носки собственных ботинок.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Парень жестами указывает на хрустальный купол, затем на вас, делает несколько пассов руками и выпрямляется по стойке смирно, упираясь глазами в носки собственных ботинок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the toes of his own boots.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

traits.locale_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the toes of his own boots.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

traits.locale_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

traits.locale_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

traits.locale_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}年轻仆人指了指水晶罩，然后又指了指你。紧接着，他打了几个莫名其妙的手势，随后肃然站立在一旁，盯着自己的靴子尖，一动不动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻仆人指了指水晶罩，然后又指了指你。紧接着，他打了几个莫名其妙的手势，随后肃然站立在一旁，盯着自己的靴子尖，一动不动。{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}Er deutet auf die Kristallkuppel, dann auf dich, dann führt er mehrere weitere Gesten aus, nimmt Habachtstellung an und blickt auf die Spitzen seiner Stiefel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Er deutet auf die Kristallkuppel, dann auf dich, dann führt er mehrere weitere Gesten aus, nimmt Habachtstellung an und blickt auf die Spitzen seiner Stiefel.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}Il fait un geste vers le dôme de cristal, puis vers vous, et effectue ensuite plusieurs autres gestes avant de se mettre au garde-à-vous, en fixant le bout de ses bottes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il fait un geste vers le dôme de cristal, puis vers vous, et effectue ensuite plusieurs autres gestes avant de se mettre au garde-à-vous, en fixant le bout de ses bottes.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}Señala la urna de cristal, luego a ti, después hace varios gestos más y se queda en posición firme, mirándote las puntas de las botas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Señala la urna de cristal, luego a ti, después hace varios gestos más y se queda en posición firme, mirándote las puntas de las botas.{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}彼はクリスタルのドームを、そしてあなたをジェスチャーで示し、それからいくつかのジェスチャーを行って、直立不動の姿勢で立ち、彼が履くブーツの先端を見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はクリスタルのドームを、そしてあなたをジェスチャーで示し、それからいくつかのジェスチャーを行って、直立不動の姿勢で立ち、彼が履くブーツの先端を見つめる。{/n}
traits.speaker: Valet

languages.text: {n}Önce kristal kubbeye, ardından da sana işaret ediyor. Birkaç hareket daha yaptıktan sonra hazır ola geçip kendi ayak uçlarına bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He gestures at the crystal dome, then at you, then makes several more gestures and stands at attention, staring at the tips of his boots.{/n}
